query: SELECT id, videoTimestamp, REPLACE(REPLACE(transcript, '\n', '[NEWLINE]'), '\r', '[CR]') as transcript_debug, LENGTH(transcript) as len FROM voice_annotations WHERE transcript IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2nXHNKWaT6KdAop.2df66c7cd877 --database SaoZcd7riW2zyxorRaqL7d --execute SELECT id, videoTimestamp, REPLACE(REPLACE(transcript, '\n', '[NEWLINE]'), '\r', '[CR]') as transcript_debug, LENGTH(transcript) as len FROM voice_annotations WHERE transcript IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
